languages.text: "Бессмертный Император есть свет путеводный, а потому есть он всюду".
"The Immortal Emperor is our guiding beacon, and so there is no place where He is not."
languages.original_text: "Бессмертный Император есть свет путеводный, а потому есть он всюду".

traits.locale_text: "The Immortal Emperor is our guiding light, and so there is no place where He is not."
"The Immortal Emperor is our guiding light, and so there is no place where He is not."
"The Immortal Emperor is our guiding beacon, and so there is no place where He is not."
"The Immortal Emperor is our guiding beacon, and so there is no place where He is not."
"The Immortal Emperor is our guiding beacon, and so there is no place where He is not."
"The Immortal Emperor is our guiding beacon, and so there is no place where He is not."

languages.text: 「不滅の皇帝は私たちの導きの光であり、彼は常におそばにいてくれる」
languages.original_text: "The Immortal Emperor is our guiding beacon, and so there is no place where He is not."

traits.locale_text: 「不滅の皇帝は私たちの導きの光であり、彼は常におそばにいてくれる」

languages.text: “不朽帝皇是我们的指路明灯，祂的明光无处不在。”
languages.original_text: "The Immortal Emperor is our guiding beacon, and so there is no place where He is not."

traits.locale_text: “不朽帝皇是我们的指路明灯，祂的明光无处不在。”

languages.text: «El Emperador Inmortal es nuestro faro guía y por eso no hay lugar donde no esté».
languages.original_text: "The Immortal Emperor is our guiding beacon, and so there is no place where He is not."

traits.locale_text: «El Emperador Inmortal es nuestro faro guía y por eso no hay lugar donde no esté».

languages.text: "Der Unsterbliche Imperator ist unser Leuchtfeuer, er weist uns den Weg. Er ist überall."
languages.original_text: "The Immortal Emperor is our guiding beacon, and so there is no place where He is not."

traits.locale_text: "Der Unsterbliche Imperator ist unser Leuchtfeuer, er weist uns den Weg. Er ist überall."

languages.text: « L'Empereur immortel nous guide, et nul lieu n'est épargné par sa lumière. »
languages.original_text: "The Immortal Emperor is our guiding beacon, and so there is no place where He is not."

traits.locale_text: « L'Empereur immortel nous guide, et nul lieu n'est épargné par sa lumière. »

languages.text: "Ölümsüz İmparator bize yol gösterir. O, daima ve her yerde bizimledir."
languages.original_text: "The Immortal Emperor is our guiding beacon, and so there is no place where He is not."

traits.locale_text: "Ölümsüz İmparator bizim yol göstericimizdir. O, daima ve her yerde bizimledir."
